description: Try our easy to follow Pear Custard Wheels recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pear Custard Wheels Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs maple syrup, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Cut sides from pears and discard cores. Thinly slice and fan out on a plate. Drizzle with 1 tbs syrup and juice. Set aside for 5 minutes. Drain.

Meanwhile, halve pastry sheets and layer 2 halves on top of each other. Using a 12cm round cutter, cut 2 rounds from each pastry stack. Place on tray. Gently press a 9cm round cutter into each pastry stack, and cut through top layer only to make a border.
Combine almond meal and custard in a bowl. Spoon evenly over pastry inside the border. Top with pear, fanning them out. Brush with remaining syrup.
Bake for 18 minutes or until pastry is puffed and golden brown. Serve topped with whipped cream and extra syrup.
